coverage_details.accommodation: Single Room; Standard suite covered up to 4,000 SAR.
coverage_details.std: Treatment of STD is covered regardless of how infection occurred, includes: Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid
coverage_details.checkup: Adult vaccination, checkup and family doctors covered according to National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines
coverage_details.vaccination: Vaccinations covered for children up to 6 years per MOH schedule and any MOH updates. Adult vaccinations included per Weqaya.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frames and contact lenses covered up to 2,000 SAR. Frames are covered twice for children up to 14 years.
coverage_details.birth_control: Cost of birth control for females covered up to 1,500 SAR. Contraceptive methods not covered for parents scheme.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Surgical obesity procedures covered if BMI ≥ 40 or BMI ≥ 35 with complications, up to 20,000 SAR. Approved surgeries: LAGB, Sleeve, Roux-En-Y Bypass, Mini/One Anastomosis Bypass, BPD Scopinaro, removal/conversion procedures per international/SA guidelines.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: Surgical obesity procedures covered if BMI ≥ 40 up to 20,000 SAR.
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Donor surgery covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: National program for early detection of newborns, hearing, and congenital heart anomalies up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.psychiatric: Psychiatric cases covered up to 50,000 SAR, non-acute psychiatry as part of this limit, up to 4 visits.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Hearing aid covered up to 6,000 SAR for all schemes. Early detection of deafness for newborns also covered.
coverage_details.dental_general: Limit 5,000 SAR with 20% deductible up to 100 SAR. Standard: includes crown, bridges, pins/post with crown, scaling once per year.
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature babies care, covered up to annual limit. Neonatal metabolic screening included (part of disability coverage).
coverage_details.circumcision: Circumcision for males covered up to 500 SAR.
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: Costs for neonatal metabolic screening up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital illnesses covered up to annual limit. Non-acute up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.maternity: Antenatal care & NVD covered up to 15,000 SAR. Maternity complications, Caesarian section, and legal abortion covered up to annual limit. Coverage not for parents. Premature newborns covered under mother's policy up to 30 days. Episiotomy and epidural injection for delivery covered.
coverage_details.optical: Limit 2,000 SAR with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible for VIP. Includes frames, contact lenses.
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Ear piercing of newborn (females) covered up to 300 SAR.
coverage_details.screening: Early detection for newborns and coverage of RSV vaccination per MOH. National programs for newborn screening up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.disability_cases: Disability cases including cost of neonatal metabolic screening for newborns up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.donor_organ_harvesting: Surgery for donor organ harvesting covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered up to annual limit. Rehabilitation and artificial limbs covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit (SR 500,000).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Companion cost covered for all members and parents; pre-existing and chronic conditions with medications covered; all joint replacement surgeries covered up to 50,000 SAR; transportation of mortal remains up to 10,000 SAR; home healthcare (including wound dressing, urinary catheter replacement, IV fluids post-surgery) covered; telemedicine covered; International SOS assistance covered for patient transport to Saudi Arabia in emergencies; medical devices for diabetes, hypertension, asthma/steam covered; nutritional supplements/vitamins/minerals covered if essential and prescribed by registered physician; local ambulance covered; allergy tests/treatment covered if prescribed; intensive care covered; psoriasis treatment covered; family planning coverage (see birth control); infectious diseases requiring isolation at MOH appointed hospitals covered; joint replacement up to 50,000 SAR; any CHI benefits also included, unless stated otherwise.
